title: Game keeps crashing
body: for the past two or so days almost every time i start LoL it crashes and sais "LoL client has stopped working" any fixes?

replies.body: Is it right after clicking the shortcut or somewhere after patching or login?
Most of the time its after i login and all the news and stuff is starting up and then the notification pops up and the client closes

Thanks for clarifying that for me. I suspect your client may be dropping its connection from the platform service, which will often crash the client entirely. Most of the time, this is caused by local network settings that don't play well with League, so I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are compatible.

Let me know if this issue persists.
